'''''Wolf Pact''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Wolf of the North Challenge|king of Wolvendom]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].
